ext_weather.name: This Afternoon
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Periods of rain and periods of drizzle. Cloudy, with a high near 62. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

state.message: Sorry, we're currently closed but we will be open tomorrow night, Monday from 7 - 10PM and next Sunday from 12 - 5PM. Check us out on Facebook.
